channel.title: Why am I the only one that lags? (I'm the hoster!)
channel.description:
It's not like slow lag.. when you click and takes a year.. it's like trashed lag.. iuno how to explain but like if I turn screen it kinda like bumps.. no clue how to explain but yeah..
Everyone else says it doesn't lag at all for them..
some information about my server and computer: PimpScape/NarbScape Source Port 43594 Using Hamachi Fast, stable connection Doesn't lag for any of the players
I've fixed like all the problems in the server I had.. this is the last major one..

item.title: Why am I the only one that lags? (I'm the hoster!)
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

I’m sorry but I just don’t know whatcha mean… like the java server where is this at?

the runserver? or what…

I found this in it:

java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2007, 03:43:12 PM[/size][hr]wow… I did and this stuff flooded down my command prompt.

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I the only one that lags? (I'm the hoster!)
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Like, you have java server for that right? Put in what I said

just like this

java -server -verbose:jni -verbose:gc -verbose -XX:+PrintCompilation server

it will print alot of statistics and other shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I the only one that lags? (I'm the hoster!)
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, next time you start the thingy, put this in there

-verbose:gc -verbose:jni -verbose -XX:+PrintCompilaion

and see what it says on the console.

@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

That might be it =\ but other people don’t lag…[br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2007, 11:43:11 AM[/size][hr]And I actually don’t know how to defragment my computer.

Since I fixed encyrption in passwords, alot of accounts are gone, but it’s no better in lag.

Fixed so many problems, but the only problem is it’s hard for me to play… =[
